name: Chaos Space
description:
Battle through swarms of interstellar foes and use jump-gates to travel from sector to sector in this rogue-like top-down space shooter. Customize your ship's weapons, engine, shields, armor, reactor and more to change up your play style. Dodge lasers, outmaneuver your enemies and see how far you can get before your ship meets its inevitable doom.

Controls

  • WASD - Move
  • L. Shift - Brake
  • L. Mouse / Space - Fire
  • i - Inventory
  • Esc - Pause Menu

Notes:

Linux and Mac builds are currently untested.
